title: My Portfolio Website
description: One of my first projects was this website. I built it using Astro, React, Typescript, Javascript, HTML and Tailwind CSS. The goal of creating this website was learning Astro, React and Typescript and showing off my projects.

title: Discord AI Bot
description: I am currently developing a Discord bot that is designed to use a LLM (Large Language Model) to chat with users. The bot is written in Python.
